title: AIIMS Report Rules Out Sushant Singh Rajput Murder Theories, Say Sources
content:
Actor Sushant Singh Rajput was not murdered and it is a case of suicide, a team of doctors from Delhi's AIIMS has said in its opinion to CBI, sources have told NDTV, dismissing the theories of poisoning and strangling floated by the actor's family and their lawyer.

title: We Don’t Even Smoke Cigarettes, Said Deepika, Sara, Rakul & Shraddha: NCB Official
content: An NBA official has revealed that all the four Bollywood actresses, Deepika Padukone, Sara Ali Khan, Rakul Singh and Shraddha Kapoor, who were recently questioned by the Narcotics Control Bureau (NCB), have denied substance abuse. title: Ex-Union Minister Jaswant Singh Dies At 82.Saddened By Demise,Says PM
content:
Jaswant Singh, who was from Rajasthan, had served as India's foreign minister, defense minister and finance minister. Former union minister Jaswant Singh, a close aide of former prime minister Atal Bihari Vajpayee, died this morning in Delhi. He was 82.

title: Sewage Workers Find A Giant Rat Inside Mexico City’s Sewer System
content:
Mexico City cleanup crews discovered a monster rat while dredging the sewers. It was part of 22 tons of litter the workers had removed from the city’s drainage tunnels following heavy rains, according to the Border Report.

title: WhatsApp's Defense Amid Row Over Leaked Chats In Drugs Probe
content:
The central agency has summoned actors Deepika Padukone and Shraddha Kapoor on basis of chats dating back to 2017, accessed from the cellphone of talent agent Jaya Saha.

title: Case filed against Sushant Singh Rajput's girlfriend Rhea Chakraborty; Salman Khan appeals his fans to ‘support’ Sushant's fans, and more...
content: Soon after Sushant Singh Rajput’s lifeless body was found hanging at his residence in Mumbai’s Bandra on June 14, Mumbai Police began an investigation and recorded the statement of his girlfriend, actress Rhea Chakraborty. Now, it seems a fan of the actor has filed a complaint in Biha

title: Glenmark's FabiFlu approved for coronavirus treatment in India, costs Rs 103 per tablet
content: Mumbai-based Glenmark Pharmaceuticals have launched a new antiviral drug - Favipiravir with brand name FabiFlu - for the treatment of mild to moderate Covid-19 patients. The firm has become the first Indian company to commercially launch an antiviral drug. Indian drug regulator Drug Controller Ge

Another fan of Sushant Singh Rajput commits suicide as she couldn't bear the actor's loss
content: The untimely demise of Sushant Singh Rajput has left a permanent void in the hearts of his fans.
